subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance Materials in Eco
body:
Hi everybody,

Can anyone tell me how to assign radiance materials to an object (i.e.
floor, ceiling, etc.) in Ecotect? I have my RAD material file in the
"material" folder of Ecotect, in "user preferences" I have given the
direction to this folder in the option of "material export directory" , and
I have my geometry modeled in Ecotect.

What should I do?
Best,

--
Dr. Adriana Lira Oliver
Ddes|MDes|BArch
www.adliol.com
http://www.flickr.com/photos/adrianaliraoliver/
